entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consistency for `os` and `arch` CLI argument names #30962
  • Unable to install any dotnet tool #30961
  • After Install 7.0.202 on Mac OS, install wasm-tools workload via Terminal met an error "Workload installation failed". #30959

Closed

  • Enable using docker build `--platform` switch (easily) #30369
    8.0.1xx
  • Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #24004
    Backlog
  • Community feedback survey #23708
    Discussion
  • [Regression] Runtime error introduced when build using SDK 5.0.301 #18229
  • [GenAPI] Add unsafe keyword if the calls of the base constructor is unsafe  #30640
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet restore fails for .NET 8 preview 1 SDK due to missing NuGet package dependency #30897
  • dotnet tool install --local takes .config/nuget.config instead of nuget.config in current working directory #23135
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet publish should default to release mode #10357
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused razor dependency #30964
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #30963

Merged

  • GenAPI: Add unsafe keyword if the calls of the base constructor is unsafe #30950
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# item templates with file-scoped namespaces #30955
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Common templates
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix passing --interactive flag to nuget #30806
  • [GenAPI] add new keyword to return types #30932
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2125975 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
